column1: '''Dramborleg''' was the great axe that [[Tuor]] favoured over any sword.
Tuor fought with it in the [[Fall of Gondolin]], slaying three [[balrogs]] and [[Othrod]] among others.<ref>{{LT2
column2: III}}, p. 181</ref>  He took it when he escaped the downfall of that city, and his descendants took it to [[Númenor]] as an heirloom.<ref name="Numenor">{{UT
column3: Numenor}}</ref>  It did not survive the [[Downfall of Númenor]].

column1: Dramborleg means 'Thudder-Sharp' in the language of the [[Gondolindrim]].<ref name="Numenor"/>
